application-form-type.legend: How would you like to apply?

new-application.label: A new application
new-application.hint: You will need a controlled drug activity user list to upload later

continue-an-application.label: Continue an application
continue-an-application.hint: An incomplete application stays on the system for 5 days and is then deleted

licensee-type.legend: What type of licensee are you?

existing-licensee-renew-or-change-site.label: Existing licensee renewing or changing a currently licensed site

existing-licensee-applying-for-new-site.label: Existing licensee applying for a new site

company-number.label: Company number (optional)
company-number.hint: Enter the  number issued by Companies House

is-premises-address-same.legend: Is the premises address the same as the licence holder address?

atleast-50-percent-from-public-fund.label: At least 50% from public funds, charitable or voluntary subscriptions

person-in-charge-confirmed-dbs.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.label: Full name
person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

person-in-charge-dbs-subscription.legend: Has the managing director or person in charge subscribed to DBS updates?

member-of-professional-body.legend: Are they, or anyone named on this application, a member of a professional body?

professional-body-details.label: Provide details of the professional bodies and relevant reference numbers
professional-body-details.hint: For example, General Medical Council and GMC reference number

legal-business-proceedings.legend: Has anyone in your organisation ever been subject to legal business proceedings?
legal-business-proceedings.hint: This includes members of the board and senior management teams. Legal proceedings includes administrative, financial or bankruptcy cases

has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.legend: Has anyone in your organisation ever received a criminal conviction?
has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.hint: This includes members of the board and senior management teams. Conviction means UK and overseas convictions.

legal-proceedings-details.label: Provide details of the legal business proceedings

responsible-for-security.legend: Who is responsible for the security of the premises?

same-as-managing-director.label: The same person as the managing director
same-as-managing-director.hint: Re-use their contact and DBS information

person-responsible-for-security-confirme.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

person-responsible-for-security-dbs-full.label: Full name
person-responsible-for-security-dbs-full.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

person-responsible-for-security-dbs-subs.legend: Has the person responsible for the security of the premises subscribed to DBS updates?

responsible-for-compliance-regulatory.legend: Who is responsible for legal compliance and regulatory affairs?

same-as-managing-director.label: The same person as the managing director
same-as-managing-director.hint: Re-use their contact and DBS information

responsible-for-compliance-regulatory-co.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

responsible-for-compliance-regulatory-db.label: Full name
responsible-for-compliance-regulatory-db.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

responsible-for-compliance-regulatory-db.legend: Has the person responsible for compliance and regulatory affairs subscribed to DBS updates?

is-employee-or-consultant.legend: Is the person responsible for legal compliance and regulatory affairs an employee or consultant?

require-witness-destruction-of-drugs.legend: Do you require somebody within your company to be authorised to witness the destruction of controlled drugs?

why-applying-licence.label: Explain why you are applying for a licence, your business purposes and what you plan to use it for

main-customer-details.label: Provide details of your main customers

source-drugs-details.hint: This includes details of your suppliers, or the raw materials and where you get them
source-drugs-details.label: Provide details of where you source the drugs from

responsible-for-witnessing-the-destructi.legend: Who is responsible for witnessing the destruction of controlled drugs?

same-as-managing-director.label: The same person as the managing director
same-as-managing-director.hint: Re-use their contact and DBS information

responsible-for-witnessing-confirmed-dbs.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

responsible-for-witnessing-dbs-fullname.label: Full name
responsible-for-witnessing-dbs-fullname.hint: Enter the name as it appears on your DBS application

responsible-for-witnessing-dbs-subscript.legend: Has the person responsible for witnessing the destruction of controlled drugs subscribed to DBS updates?

has-any-licence-issued-by-mhra.legend: Does your business possess any licences issued by the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA)?

is-business-registered-with-cqc.legend: Is your business registered with the Care Quality Commission or Scottish and Welsh equivalents?

regulatory-body-registration-details.label: Provide details of any other regulatory bodies that you are registered with (optional)
regulatory-body-registration-details.hint: For example the Veterinary Medicines Directorate, the United Kingdom Accreditation Service or the Food Standards Agency

site-owner-telephone.label: Contact telephone number
site-owner-telephone.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

trading-reasons.label: What trading reasons does this site need a licence for?
trading-reasons.hint: Select one reason to begin with. You can add more reasons in the next step

service-under-contract.legend: Are you providing a service under a contract?
service-under-contract.hint: For example, healthcare or clinical services

service-expiry-date.legend: What date does the service expire on?

status-of-site.legend: What is the status of the site to be licensed?

schedule-1-activities.hint: Covers drugs that have no therapeutic value. Examples include MDMA ('ecstasy') and lysergamide

schedule-2-activities.hint: Covers drugs that have therapeutic value, but are highly addictive. Examples include potent opioids, such as diamorphine and morphine

schedule-3-activities.hint: Covers drugs that have therapeutic value, but have slightly lighter control requirements. Examples include temazepam, midazolam and buprenorphine

schedule-4-part-1-activities.hint: Covers benzodiazepines. For example, bromazepam, diazepam and triazolam

schedule-4-part-2-activities.hint: Covers anabolic and androgenic steroids. Examples include prasterone, testosterone, nandrolone and bolandiol

schedule-5-activities.hint: Covers weaker preparations of schedule 2 drugs. Examples include codeine, medicinal opium or morphine (less than 0.2% concentration)

security-features.legend: Which of the following security features does the site have?

lockable-physical-security.label: Lockable physical security, such as a room, safe or cabinet for the storage of the controlled drugs

cd-kept-in-separate-room.legend: Are controlled drugs kept in a separate room or zone?

cd-kept-in-safe-or-cabinet.legend: Are controlled drugs kept in a safe or cabinet?
